Hello,

I'm just getting started working with Heritrix.  I've implemented a=

Writer processor called HDFSWriterProcessor to write content directly
into=
 the Hadoop Distributed Filesystem.  For those of you not familiar
with Had=
oop, it is an open source implementation of the Google File
System and Map/=
Reduce system.  It stores files by breaking them into
chunks and distributi=
ng n replicas of each chunk across different
nodes.  It allows you to do hi=
gh-speed distributed processing of your
crawled data reliably, using a larg=
e cluster of machines.

The code is mostly isolated to new source files, bu=
t I had to make a
couple of small changes to some of the existing interface=
s.  If there
is any interest, I'm willing to offer it to the project.

- Do=
ug Judd
  www.zvents.com
  doug@...
